section.p:
If you have the codeword Cenotaph, now.
Otherwise read on.

The only place you can find to stay is a tiny rat-infested garret above a noisy tavern. At night the room fills with smoke from the taproom below, and the roof lets in the rain. The innkeeper wants 1 Shard a day for this hovel. Each day you spend here, roll a die.
On a score of 1-5 you can
regain 1 Stamina point
if injured,
but on a roll of 6 you get dysentery and
lose 1 Stamina
.
When you are ready to leave, settle your bill and then .
